# The `VPWidenRecipe` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpwidenrecipe">VPWidenRecipe</a> is a recipe for producing a widened instruction using the opcode and operands of the recipe. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VPWidenRecipe</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpwidenrecipe">VPWidenRecipe</a> is a recipe for producing a widened instruction using the opcode and operands of the recipe.

This recipe covers most of the traditional vectorization cases where each recipe transforms into a vectorized version of itself.

Definition at line 1435 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
